deleteDialog.title: Confirm or Cancel Delete

settings.title: Settings
settings.persistMsg: Persist messages until you close them manually
settings.timeoutMsg: Set the duration of the message via the slider

management.title: Data Management
management.exportText: Save a copy of your transactions to a CSV file for backup or use in spreadsheets.
management.deleteTransText: Deletes every transansaction but preserves your settings (language, currency, message timeout).
management.restoreSettingsText: Restores all settings (language, currency, date format) to their defaults but preserves all transactions.
management.deleteEverythingText: This deletes every transaction AND all of your settings, then restarts the app with default settings.
management.confirmDeleteAllTransactions: Are you sure? This will delete all of your transactions but keep your settings. You cannot undo this. Proceed?
management.confirmRestoreAllSettings: Are you sure? This will restore all settings to defaults but keep your transactions. You cannot undo this. Proceed?
management.confirmDeleteEverything: STOP: This will permanently erase ALL transactions and ALL settings. You cannot undo this. Proceed?
management.restore_settings_failed: Failed to restore all settings to their defaults.
management.full_wipe_failed: Failed to delete all transactions and to restore all settings to their defaults.

accountSummary.title: Account Summary
accountSummary.alert: You won't see anything here until you add at least one Transaction via the {addNew} form below.

addTrans.title: Add New Transaction
addTrans.err_missing_or_negative: The amount cannot be missing or negative.
addTrans.submit_failed: The new transaction failed the submit validations.

keyboard.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboard.paraEsc: You may use the {Esc} key on your keyboard to cancel this update rather than using the {iconHelp} icon or the Cancel button.
keyboard.paraEnter: You may use the {Enter} key on your keyboard to save the changes you made here rather than using the Save button.
keyboard.paraTab: You may use the {Tab} key on your keyboard to jump between fields on forms that contain multiple fields.

about.title: About
about.introParagraph: This app is a descendant of one I originally built while following {linkTraversy}. I then made a number of upgrades which are summarized below:
enhancements: Tests were written and executed for the original Vue components.
The props were almost entirely replaced by Pinia stores.
Vue components were replaced by Vuetify components.
Javascript modules were converted to TypeScript.
Some internationalization/localization was done to make monetary amounts appear in the correct format for the locale in which the app is running.
A confirm dialog was added to ensure that the user really means to delete the transaction chosen for deletion.
The AccountBalance and IncomeExpense components were merged into a single new component called AccountSummary.
A new component called Money was created to display all instances of money except where it is being input or edited.

A transaction date was added to the Transaction definition so that users could record when the income was made or the expense incurred. The date is now input in AddTransaction, displayed in TransactionHistory and DeleteTransaction, and both displayed and changed in UpdateTransaction.
The various individual Settings dialogs were merged into a single tabbed Settings Dialog. This was later simplified to an untabbed dialog that managed fewer settings.
Added Sentry so that errors and warnings would be properly logged, reassuring users and bringing issues to the attention of administrators.
Translated all of the text visible (and audible) to the user into a variety of locales and widely-spoken languages so that users could use the app in all of those places.
Added PostHog to track information and success messages for analytical purposes.
Added Vue Router and Register/Login pages so that users could be authenticated and that a given user's transaction data and settings could be kept separate from all other users.
Replaced all usages of localStorage with Supabase.

history.title: Transaction History
history.alert: You won't see any transactions here until you add some via the {addNew} form below.

updateDialog.title: Update Transaction
updateDialog.noChanges: Nothing in this transaction was changed so no update was performed.
updateDialog.failedUI: The update failed in the user interface.

useApp.reqd: This field is required. Zero is not allowed.
useApp.reqdZeroOk: This field is required. Zero is allowed in a numeric field.
useApp.transReqd: A transaction type must be chosen.
useApp.timeoutInteger: Timeout must be a positive number or zero.
useApp.notFuture: Transaction date cannot be in the future (tomorrow or later).
useApp.notPrevYear: Transaction date cannot be from a previous calendar year {year}.
useApp.greater: Amount must be supplied and must be greater than zero.
useApp.wrongSeparator: Please use {separator} as the decimal separator.

transactionStore.updated: Succesfully updated the transaction with ID {id}.
transactionStore.update_failed: Failed to update the transaction with ID {id}.
transactionStore.deleteOne: Successfully deleted the transaction with ID {id}.
transactionStore.deleteOne_failed: Failed to delete the transaction with ID {id}.
transactionStore.deleteAll: Successfully deleted all of the transactions.
transactionStore.deleteAll_failed: Failed to delete all of the transactions.
